REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F RM f0609 reute r f BC-CNW-<CNW>-SELLS-BONDS 03-13 0061

TEXT.TITLE: CNW <CNW> SELLS BONDS
TEXT.BODY: CNW Corp said its Chicago and North Western Transportation Co sold 25 mln dlrs of consolidated mortgage 9.93 pct bonds, series C, due 1992, in a private placement. Morgan Stanley and Co Inc was the placement agent. The bonds were sold yesterday. Proceeds of the bond sale will be used for general corporate purposes. Reuter
